description: Detects successful code compilation via Visual Basic Command Line Compiler that utilizes Windows Resource to Object Converter. Author: Ensar Şamil, @sblmsrsn, @oscd_initiative. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Utilization of this tool should not be seen in enterprise environment
name: Visual Basic Command Line Compiler Usage
